properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM INQUIRY WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , I.* FROM (SELECT INQ_NO , INQUIRY_TYPE , M.MEMBER_ID MEMBER_ID , TITLE , DATE_CREATE FROM INQUIRY I JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE I.DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DATE_CREATE DESC ) I ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
